summary: The story of the 1980s snooker rivalry between the flamboyant Alex Higgins and the methodical Steve Davis.
cast: Dennis Taylor|Steve Davis|Alex Higgins|Luke Treadaway|Will Merrick|Kevin Bishop|Nichola Burley|James Bailey|Daniel Fearn|John Sessions|Tom Fisher|Rob Crouch|Russ Bain|Marc McCardie|Caolan Byrne|Gary Davis|Jimmy Watkins|Konstantine Osipenkov|Daniel Abelson|Ross Gurney-Randall|Chris Corrigan|Fergal McElherron|Phillip Laing|Eamonn Fleming|Chris Grahamson|Maisie Jenkins|B. Robert Grimes|Stuart Jason Lee|Paul Mount|Pino Maiello
title: The Rack Pack
